summary: Build a basic yet attractive blogging website called "Baatein With Nukkadbaaz" run by Heena Mehta, focused on theatre-related news (workshops, stage shows, interviews with veteran artists, etc.) with complementary fonts/colors and relevant images.
architectural_notes: Site branding/content: "Baatein With Nukkadbaaz" run by Heena Mehta; audience is theatre enthusiasts; content includes workshops, stage shows, interviews, theatre news.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Theatre-themed blog logo mark with text “Baatein With Nukkadbaaz” (baatein-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Wide stage-curtain/spotlight hero banner illustration/photo-style image (baatein-hero.dim_1600x600.png)
- Set of 4 minimal theatre-themed category icons (masks/curtain/microphone/ticket) in a consistent style (baatein-category-icons.dim_1024x256.png)
- Neutral theatre-themed post cover placeholder image (baatein-post-placeholder.dim_1200x630.png)

existing_features.title: Create a basic, attractive public website for the blog “Baatein With Nukkadbaaz” with clear navigation and core pages: Home, Posts (listing), Post Details, and About (profile of Heena Mehta and the blog mission for theatre enthusiasts). All user-facing text must be in English.

Implement a coherent visual theme suitable for theatre journalism that is “basic yet attractive,” with complementary typography and colors applied consistently across pages (avoid a blue/purple-dominant palette).
Support theatre-relevant post categorization and filtering at minimum for: Workshops, Stage Shows, Interviews, and Theatre News (or equivalent labels), and allow users to filter posts by category.

Add an admin authoring experience in the frontend for Heena Mehta to manage posts: sign in with Internet Identity, create a post (title, category, cover image, excerpt, rich/markdown-like body text), edit, and delete.
Use relevant static images throughout the site (hero/banner, blog logo, and post cover placeholders) stored in the frontend as static assets, and display them in the layout and post cards.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a basic yet attractive theatre-focused blogging website "Baatein With Nukkadbaaz" for Heena Mehta (blog posts on workshops, stage shows, interviews, theatre news) with complementary typography/colors and relevant images.
Implement persistent blog post storage and retrieval in the Motoko backend, including: list posts (newest first), get post by id/slug, and admin-only create/update/delete posts.

Seed the application with a small set of initial example posts relevant to theatre (at least 6), spanning Workshops, Stage Shows, Interviews, and Theatre News, so the site looks complete on first load.
